name: Wizerd Wars
description:
Four unlikely people find insanely powerful runes in an old battle field, To see who can become king of the wizards.

  • Current game build needs controllers to play (Preferably Xbox)
  • 4 player 2 vs 2 combat, current build has no AI
  • King of the hill, capture mid and hold it to win the game
  • Left Joystick to move, right Joystick to aim, triggers to cast spells. Need to have two runes to cast a spell. Must aim in order to cast a spell.
